title: Computer, "TAM", 1997
provenance: Manufactured 1997, acquired by Bill Moggridge 1997, given to Cooper-Hewitt 2011.
dimensions:
H x W x D (display unit): 43.2 x 41.9 x 26 cm (17 x 16 1/2 x 10 1/4 in.)
H x W x D (keyboard): 4.4 x 29.2 x 22.5 cm (1 3/4 x 11 1/2 x 8 7/8 in.)
H x W x D (CPU/Bose): 26.7 x 18.4 x 27.9 cm (10 1/2 x 7 1/4 x 11 in.)
description: Upright, shallow rectangular metallic gray monitor unit (a); CD drawer and controls below screen flanked by long rectangular speakers; short base with curved foot. Separate gray keyboard (b) with leather wrist wrests; trackpad in front center. Separate short, tapering columnar gray CPU (c), including sound system woofer.

tombstone.epitaph:
Computer, "TAM", 1997.
1997. Plastic, metal, glass, leather. Gift of Bill Moggridge. 2011-18-1-a/c.
